Description: With an appointment FHIR ID, this web service returns up-to-date appointment information.
SampleResponse:
<Appointment xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="e3snc6SrCHi1PVOB5rkVvVqvlJgecR4RzazTZuc2UMqA3"/>

<identifier>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.8.698084.10006286212"/>

<value value="10006286212"/>

</identifier>

<status value="noshow"/>

<serviceType>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.2.808267"/>

<code value="2328705"/>

<display value="BPM Book Anywhere"/>

</coding>

</serviceType>

<start value="2017-10-06T20:45:00Z"/>

<end value="2017-10-06T21:15:00Z"/>

<minutesDuration value="30"/>

<comment value="Bring your insurance card and a photo ID. Please be respectful of others in the waiting room and arrive on time."/>

<participant>

<actor>

<reference value="https://vs-icx.epic.com:443/Interconnect-CDE/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/efvHwbc1k1CQ9XjM1zvvefQ3"/>

<display value="Cds, Fhir D Jr., Esq."/>

</actor>

<status value="accepted"/>

</participant>

<participant>

<actor>

<reference value="https://vs-icx.epic.com:443/Interconnect-CDE/api/FHIR/STU3/Practitioner/euj3vVq.XS7gwizdNR-HTgg3"/>

<display value="Ecnw, Provider, MD"/>

</actor>

<status value="accepted"/>

</participant>

<participant>

<actor>

<reference value="https://vs-icx.epic.com:443/Interconnect-CDE/api/FHIR/STU3/Location/en9.gx8URXBowZGtf5pc0oBBVydCX5LUs5hE4nlE8LlI3"/>

<display value="ECNW Department"/>

</actor>

<status value="accepted"/>

</participant>

</Appointment>

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for an Appointment resource.

Appointment.Name: Appointment
Appointment.Description: An instance of the STU3 Appointment resource.

Appointment.Status OrderStatus.Name: extension
Appointment.Status OrderStatus.Description: The order status for the order associated with the appointment. This extension is returned only for organizations in the Netherlands.

created.Name: created
created.Description: The date when the appointment was created.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/eAfspraak-Appointment

minutesDuration.Name: minutesDuration
minutesDuration.Description: The estimated length of the appointment.

participant.Name: participant
participant.Description: Patient, providers, and locations associated with the appointment.

slot.Name: slot
slot.Description: The slot or slots that this appointment is filling.
